action.action-desc: Mr. Blumenthal (for himself and Mr. Rounds) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To expand the VetSuccess on Campus program of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ensuring VetSuccess On Campus Act of 2025.

section.header: Expansion of VetSuccess on Campus program to at least one location in each State

subsection.text: The Secretary of Veterans Affairs shall ensure that the VetSuccess on Campus program of the Department of Veterans Affairs is located in every State.

In carrying out subsection (a), the Secretary shall ensure that at least one counselor of the VetSuccess on Campus program is located in each State, notwithstanding the number of individuals in a State or at an educational institution who may qualify to participate in the program.

In carrying out this section, the Secretary shall give preference to educational institutions that have the largest populations of students who are pursuing programs of education at such institutions with educational assistance provided under laws administered by the Secretary.
In this section, the term State has the meaning given such term in section 101 of title 38, United States Code.
